page.title: 16A day in the life of Edward
page.content: In the morning at a quarter to eight I go downstairs. I have'Shreddies' for breakfast. I then get dressed and pack my bag ready for school. Mummy takes us to school in the car, and we can go out and play until the bell goes at ten past nine. We come in, do our handwriting and some number work. At play time we play 'Stuck in the Mud,' then we come in and read our books and do a 'Reading Route'. For lunch I have egg sandwiches, a packet of crisps and a drink. After another playtime we change and go out to play 'Rounders'. We come back in and do some singing, before we go home at 3.30pm. We go to 'Safeway' in Blandford to buy food on the way home. After supper I do some throwing with Anna, and then we go to bed.
